feed.title: ngkoksongofficial TikTok
feed.subtitle: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from ngkoksongofficial

entry.title: Philanthropy is not just the giving of money. Companies in Singapore could do more to promote this idea of structured volunteerism. It means establishing a way for employees to contribute to community work. Encourage staff to go down to the ground and do
entry.content: Philanthropy is not just the giving of money. Companies in Singapore could do more to promote this idea of structured volunteerism. It means establishing a way for employees to contribute to community work. Encourage staff to go down to the ground and do simple things such as distributing food to the poor. It doesn‚Äôt cost a lot of money but it costs time. So the leadership of these organisations must set an example. üôå #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture #adulting #happiness #love

entry.title: Testimonial for Ng Kok Song By Tjio Kay Loen Former Assistant General Manager, OCBC #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture
entry.content: Testimonial for Ng Kok Song By Tjio Kay Loen Former Assistant General Manager, OCBC #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture

entry.title: Stepping into the markets after receiving my Certificate of Eligibility felt like a dream. When I was a kid, I spent most of time helping my dad at the fish market. Now I‚Äôm running to be your elected President. My dream has always been to be able to serve
entry.content: Stepping into the markets after receiving my Certificate of Eligibility felt like a dream. When I was a kid, I spent most of time helping my dad at the fish market. Now I‚Äôm running to be your elected President. My dream has always been to be able to serve others. After working in the GIC for 45 years, serving the welfare of Singaporeans, I am honoured to be able to serve again. I will honour the hopes and dreams of our past, present and future generations. Thank you Singapore! #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture #dreamscometrue #lifegoals #goals

entry.title: I loved at my job at the GIC too much because it was a job that brought out the best in me. I found meaning in it because I was not working for the shareholders of Goldman Sachs. I was working to build up the reserves for the people of Singapore. Now I wa
entry.content: I loved at my job at the GIC too much because it was a job that brought out the best in me. I found meaning in it because I was not working for the shareholders of Goldman Sachs. I was working to build up the reserves for the people of Singapore. Now I want to help safeguard these reserves as President. When you have a job that brings out the best in you and benefits others, that is good work. Consider asking yourself, what is it that brings out the best in you? #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture

entry.title: Some friends heard about the two bookends of my career which I shared at a @Mothership interview, and asked to read them. The first was a testimonial from my school teacher when I graduated from Montfort School. The second was a letter from PM Lee Hsien L
entry.content: Some friends heard about the two bookends of my career which I shared at a @Mothership interview, and asked to read them. The first was a testimonial from my school teacher when I graduated from Montfort School. The second was a letter from PM Lee Hsien Loong when I retired from GIC. These two documents are the bookends of my career. #unitedforourfuture #ngkoksong2023

entry.title: I got the chance to share about my long commitment to our financial defence with @l@ZYRUP Media. I talked about the strategies I proposed and executed in GIC. It was my dream job because I found happiness in contributing to the welfare of Singaporeans. It
entry.content: I got the chance to share about my long commitment to our financial defence with @l@ZYRUP Media. I talked about the strategies I proposed and executed in GIC. It was my dream job because I found happiness in contributing to the welfare of Singaporeans. It is great to see you guys invested in politics too. Also, congrats on the success of your podcast. Stay tuned for this episode tomorrow üëè #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture

entry.title: Sybil spoke to @Mothership to share her personal stories. Sybil is a rather private person but she hopes for more people to understand her better. She talks about our relationship, her mum, and her philanthropy! Can‚Äôt give too much away as this is her sto
entry.content: Sybil spoke to @Mothership to share her personal stories. Sybil is a rather private person but she hopes for more people to understand her better. She talks about our relationship, her mum, and her philanthropy! Can‚Äôt give too much away as this is her story to tell. Stay tuned for the interview out soon! Thank you for being by my side through this journey. #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture #womenoftiktok #womenempowerment #womenpower

entry.title: My story is one of hope. I had to give up a scholarship to study overseas, because we were poor and I had to look after my family. My dreams came true when I got myself a bursary. It was my only way out of poverty and I had to work for the government. Tha
entry.content: My story is one of hope. I had to give up a scholarship to study overseas, because we were poor and I had to look after my family. My dreams came true when I got myself a bursary. It was my only way out of poverty and I had to work for the government. That was how I ended up at MAS and then GIC. I took so much pride in my work because it made me happy. I was able to contribute to growing the reserves for Singapore too. I want to inspire all of you to never give up on your hopes and dreams. I will safeguard your hopes and dreams as your president. Thank you Singapore for everything. #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture #family #love #dreamscometrue

entry.title: The role of the president should evolve with our experience. Our youth are increasingly involved in advocacy and the community. I think the president will be able to unite our country better if he or she evolves to fit the needs of the people too. I want
entry.content: The role of the president should evolve with our experience. Our youth are increasingly involved in advocacy and the community. I think the president will be able to unite our country better if he or she evolves to fit the needs of the people too. I want to teach our youths to be financially literate and help all of us alleviate our stress. Sybil is a huge advocate for the arts and people with special needs. We both will be able to uplift Singaporeans. It will be our honour to be given that chance. #unitedforourfuture #ngkoksong2023

entry.title: Love is the greatest gift I have received from life. My mother‚Äôs love inspired me to study hard and win a bursary so I would never see her cry again. My late wife Patricia taught me about unconditional love in our 33 years of marriage. When she passed, I
entry.content: Love is the greatest gift I have received from life. My mother‚Äôs love inspired me to study hard and win a bursary so I would never see her cry again. My late wife Patricia taught me about unconditional love in our 33 years of marriage. When she passed, I became a single dad. I learned more about love as I played the roles of mother and father to my youngest daughter. After 14 years of being single, Sybil walked into my life to bless me with newfound love. Thanks to her, I am still learning so much and I am thankful to have her as my equal partner in this journey. I want to give back to Singapore for all the love it has given me. It would be the greatest honour of my life. #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture #love #family #lifelessons
